data.title: DWTSâ€™ Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy Reveal Name of 3rd Baby
data.meta_description: â€˜Dancing With the Starsâ€™ couple Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy welcomed their third child on July 12
data.text:
Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy joyously introduce their newborn son to the world!

The Dancing With the Stars pros unveiled their baby boyâ€™s name alongside a heartwarming close-up photo on Instagram on Friday, July 12.

â€œğŸ’™ Milan Maksim Chmerkovskiy ğŸ’™,â€ the couple declared in a joint post via Instagram. â€œBorn 8:48 AM ã€°ï¸ 7/12/24 ã€°ï¸ 8 pounds.â€

â€œThe fam is complete,â€ they added.

In the touching snapshot, little Milan appeared serene with his eyes peacefully closed, one tiny hand nestled against his head and the other gently resting on his swaddled blanket as Murgatroyd lovingly cradled him in a hospital bed.

Murgatroyd, 37, and Chmerkovskiy, 44, who also share sons Shai, 7, and Rio, 13 months, celebrated the new addition on their respective Instagram Stories.

The Australia native posted the announcement adorned with a pink and blue sticker that read, â€œWelcome to the world,â€ while the Ukrainian dancer expressed his excitement in the caption, â€œToday was a fantastic day!!! Welcome to the world Milan!!!â€

Earlier on the same day, the TV personalities had announced the arrival of their third bundle of joy, sharing a snapshot of themselves with the newborn.

â€œHe is officially evicted from his mom and he is sooooo cute!!!!â€ Chmerkovskiy shared via Instagram.

â€œBirth details later but for now we wanted to let you all know that mom and baby are doing perfect, and delivery took around 47 seconds total! Exactly one push!â€ the proud dad continued. â€œAlso thank you all for the beautiful messages we have been receiving. Means a lot and very much appreciated.â€

Just hours before Murgatroyd gave birth, Chmerkovskiy exclusively spoke to Us Weekly on the red carpet of the 2024 ESPY Awards at the Dolby Theater in Hollywood, where he expressed his readiness to rush to the hospital if his wife went into labor.

â€œWeâ€™re excited,â€ Chmerkovskiy shared. â€œThe first one was like an out-of-body experience. The second was stress about doing it right. This one is exciting. I want him to come out. I want us to be done and complete and move on.â€

Murgatroyd had announced her pregnancy in February, mere months after welcoming son Rio.

â€œWe Are Having A Baby ğŸ‰ğŸ™ˆğŸ™ğŸ» Yes we knowâ€¦we just had a babyâ€¦ haha!â€ she revealed via Instagram. â€œThis was very unexpected at (4 months postpartum with Rio) but we are sooooo happy and so ready to be a family of 5 soon!â€

The couple first crossed paths on Broadway in 2009 and later reconnected on Dancing With the Stars, sparking a romance in 2012. Their engagement followed in December 2015 during an onstage performance, and they officially tied the knot in July 2017 with a dual celebration: a small ceremony at City Hall and a grand 300-guest reception in New York City.
